name: Wingless Workload or her majesty dies
name_original: Wingless Workload or her majesty dies
description:
Created for the VimJam2 in 10 days, Wingless Workload or her majesty dies is a fun take on the single-screen arcade platformers of the 80s.

In a gameboy-esque aesthetic, play as Zippy the loyal wingless bee trying to keep her dying Queen Beeatrice alive has long as possible!

Explore 4 uniquely themed levels to find the flowers keeping your Queen alive, each accompanied by a wonderful music tracks composed by Jonpon for the project.

How long will your Queen survive?

Can you top the online leaderboard?
